H0.text: David Lloyd George was British Prime Minister during the reign of which monarch. Edward VII

H1.text: David Lloyd George was British Prime Minister during the reign of which monarch. Edward VIII

H2.text: David Lloyd George was British Prime Minister during the reign of which monarch. George VI

H3.text: David Lloyd George was British Prime Minister during the reign of which monarch. George V

A4.text: Lloyd George's People's Budget was rejected by the Conservative and Unionist-dominated House of Lords in the year before George V inherited the throne.

A5.text: After the January 1910 general election, the Conservative peers allowed the budget, for which the government now had an electoral mandate, to pass without a vote.
